UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Api88 is a novel antibacterial designer peptide to treat systemic infections with multidrug-resistant Gram-negative pathogens.
Literature.Author: Czihal P, Knappe D, Hoffmann R, et al.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli 45849(MIC=1µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae 123132(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhi S5(MIC=<0.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli D31(MIC=4µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae K6 ATCC 700603(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700408(MIC=4µg/ml),Agrobacterium tumefaciens ATCC 15955(MIC=0.33µg/ml),Escherichia coli DSM 10233(MIC=1.95µg/ml),Escherichia coli BL21AI(MIC=1.95µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 10240(MIC=0.98µg/ml),Escherichia coli DSM 1103(MIC=3.91µg/ml),Escherichia coli DC2(MIC=0.98µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 681(MIC=3.9µg/ml),Mycobacterium vaccae(MIC=125µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis DSM 347(MIC=125µg/ml)
